bibl.title: Berenike 1996. Report of the 1996 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 3.)
bibl.note: tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 2 plans h. t.

Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1995 - March 1996. - Pp. 193-198: Greek and Latin Textual Material, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT: 1. Greek Inscription. Dedication to Caracalla cum suis by an archer from Palmyra, 8 September 215 A.D.; - 2. Fragment of a Greek ostracon, mid-second century A.D.
